name: typedoc-plugin-markdown
description: A plugin for TypeDoc that exposes a theme and additional arguments for rendering markdown.

scripts.examples: rimraf examples/out && typedoc ./examples/src --out ./examples/out --theme markdown --gitRevision master --readme none --media test/src/media/ --includes test/src/inc/
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.json && npm run copy:static
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.pretest: rimraf test/out && rimraf node_modules/typedoc-plugin-markdown && npm run copy:plugin

author: Thomas Grey
